name: cybermon
description: A futuristic mobile hardware monitoring dashboard.
readme_summary: CyberMon is a futuristic mobile hardware monitoring dashboard built with Svelte. It visualizes system statistics fetched from LibreHardwareMonitor, allowing users to remotely track their computer's hardware performance on their mobile devices.
primary_use_case: To provide users with a sleek, mobile-first interface for monitoring their computer's hardware performance remotely.
cover_image_prompt: A sleek, futuristic mobile phone displaying a vibrant, holographic dashboard with glowing graphs and real-time data streams representing CPU, GPU, and RAM usage. The phone is connected by a subtle, ethereal beam of light to a stylized, transparent computer tower in the background, from which the data originates. Small, glowing icons representing sensors float around the phone. The overall mood is high-tech and informative, with a dark, ambient background and neon blue and green accents. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, minimalist aesthetic, emphasizing the seamless flow of information from hardware to mobile display.

name: Netflix-Prime-Auto-Skip
description: Automatically skip Ads, Intros, Credits, etc. on all major Streaming services
readme_summary: This repository provides browser extensions for Chrome and Firefox that automatically skip advertisements, intros, recaps, and credits on major streaming services. It aims to enhance the viewing experience by removing unwanted interruptions.
key_features: Automatic skipping of ads, intros, recaps, and credits
Support for major streaming services like Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Crunchyroll, and HBO
Available as extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Microsoft Edge
Installation support for Android via Firefox or Kiwi Browser
Automatic DRM installation for streaming services
primary_use_case: To provide an uninterrupted streaming experience by automatically skipping non-essential content on various online streaming platforms.
cover_image_prompt: A digital remote control with a glowing 'skip' button at its center, hovering over a television screen displaying a montage of streaming service logos (Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, etc.). The remote is actively 'pressing' the skip button, causing a visual 'wave' of digital energy to emanate outwards, dissolving elements like 'AD', 'INTRO', and 'CREDITS' that are floating near the screen. Subtle lines of code or data streams flow from the remote to the screen, indicating the extension's action. The overall mood is one of seamless convenience and enhanced viewing. The style should be a clean, modern 3D isometric illustration with a vibrant, yet uncluttered color palette.

name: alchemy
description: :crystal_ball: File conversion, all from the menu bar
readme_summary: Alchemy is an open-source, menu-bar application built with Electron and React that allows users to easily convert and merge files. It provides a simple drag-and-drop interface for batch processing various file types, including merging images into a single PDF.
primary_use_case: Batch conversion and merging of files through a user-friendly menu bar application.
cover_image_prompt: A magical alchemist's workbench where raw, unrefined files (represented by rough stones and scattered papers) are being transformed by glowing alembics and bubbling beakers into polished, perfectly formed files (represented by gleaming gems and neatly bound documents). The alchemist, a friendly character, is using a simple, intuitive interface displayed on a floating screen to select the desired transformations. Subtle digital particles and UI elements hint at the underlying software. The scene is set in a cozy, well-lit workshop, with the 'Alchemy' name subtly etched into a wooden beam. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with a warm color palette and clear, friendly iconography.

name: windmouse
description: Human-like mouse movement library implementing the WindMouse algorithm for bot detection avoidance
readme_summary: WindMouse is a Python library designed to simulate human-like mouse movements, making automated actions less detectable by bot detection systems. It implements the WindMouse algorithm to create natural, non-linear paths with variable speeds, supporting both PyAutoGUI and AutoHotkey backends.
key_features: Allows fine-grained control over movement physics (gravity, wind, damping)
Implements the WindMouse algorithm for realistic movement
primary_use_case: Avoiding bot detection in automation scripts by simulating human-like mouse movements.
cover_image_prompt: A whimsical, slightly mischievous mouse character, not a literal rodent but a digital avatar, playfully navigating a complex digital maze. Instead of a straight line, its path is a graceful, flowing curve, like a gentle breeze (wind) guiding it. Small digital particles representing 'gravity' pull it subtly towards the exit, while 'wind' elements create slight, natural deviations. The maze walls are made of abstract code blocks and security icons. The mouse avatar leaves a faint, glowing trail that looks organic, not robotic. The overall mood is lighthearted and clever, suggesting a smart bypass of detection. The style is a 3D isometric illustration with soft, glowing digital elements and a clean, uncluttered background.

name: ui
readme_summary: This repository provides examples of simple UI components built with HTML and CSS, serving as a learning resource for modern frontend development. It complements a broader course offering that includes an ebook, interactive tutorials, and quizzes.
primary_use_case: To showcase and provide examples of basic UI components for learning modern frontend development with HTML and CSS.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting beautiful, intricate building blocks (representing UI components) from raw materials like HTML code scrolls and CSS color palettes. The artisan is assembling these blocks into a cohesive, aesthetically pleasing structure, symbolizing a well-designed user interface. Small, glowing digital particles representing code flow around the artisan's hands. The background is a clean, modern workshop with subtle blueprints of web layouts visible. The scene is brightly lit, emphasizing creativity and precision. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear, understandable visual metaphors and a vibrant color scheme.
